experiences.description: Assisted the product team in market research, competitive analysis, and user story creation. Contributed to the development of new product features by gathering user feedback and analyzing data. Supported the launch of a new mobile application by creating marketing materials and providing customer support. Presented findings and recommendations to senior management.

Managed the development and launch of several new product features, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement. Conducted user research to identify customer needs and pain points. Collaborated with engineering and design teams to create user-friendly and effective product solutions. Tracked and analyzed product performance metrics to identify areas for improvement. Presented product roadmap and strategy to stakeholders.

Led the product strategy and roadmap for the company's flagship software product. Defined product vision, goals, and key performance indicators. Prioritized features based on customer needs, market trends, and business goals. Managed a team of product managers and designers. Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including engineering, marketing, and sales, to ensure successful product launches. Increased user satisfaction by 15% through implementing user-centered design principles.

education.description: Specialized in Marketing and Innovation. Graduated with honors. Focused on digital marketing strategies and new product development. Participated in several case competitions and won first place in the L'Or√©al Brandstorm competition.

Studied Entrepreneurship and Innovation at the Haas School of Business. Participated in workshops and seminars on venture capital, startup financing, and product design. Developed a business plan for a mobile application targeting the student market.
